pr_title: Change the default port that the OTLP exporters point to.

timeline.bodyText: Thanks for the fixes! While we're here, should we extract constants for constant labels?
timeline.author: anuraaga

replies.bodyText: Though as an aside, after seeing some metrics code recently, I sort of wish constant labels could be specified when creating a meter instead of only when observing to save the tedium of always extracting constants to save allocation
replies.author: anuraaga

replies.bodyText: This was a feature in the API that we decided to remove from the API for now. It may very well come back later, but we wanted to limit the features pre-GA, I think.
replies.author: jkwatson

replies.bodyText: yeah, I guess this could just be a constant for the labels instance, eh? Very happy to make that happen, either as a follow-up, or part of this PR.
replies.author: jkwatson

replies.bodyText: Either's fine with me this is approved :)
replies.author: anuraaga

replies.bodyText: easy enough to do, so I just amended this PR with the constant label extraction
replies.author: jkwatson

timeline.message: Change the default port that the OTLP exporters point to.
extract constants for the export metrics labels
extract constants for the export metrics labels
